summary: The module defines a suite of unit tests that verify the automatic batch size scaling functionality of the Lightning training framework. It includes custom data module and model helpers to configure batch sizes, and tests cover warning emission, attribute handling, integration with the Trainer, mixed precision, callback behavior, distributed strategies, multiple validation loaders, error conditions, and tuner method validation.
business_intent: Validate and safeguard the correctness and robustness of Lightning's batch size scaling utilities, ensuring they work across different configurations, raise appropriate warnings or errors, and integrate seamlessly with models, data modules, and distributed training setups.
